name: ai-writing-assistant
description: AI-powered writing assistant with spell check, grammar check, and text analysis

scripts.build: cd client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.start: cd server && npm install && npm start
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run dev" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.install-deps: cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
